page.description: Displays a confirmation dialog before a control is deleted from the Tabbed UI layout.

discussion.p: When you delete controls from the Tabbed UI Controls pane, Alpha Anywhere prompts for confirmation as deleting controls is a permanent action (there is no undo). *[ui:Delete confirmation dialog]* controls whether or not the confirmation is shown.

description.p: This setting only applies to the warning shown in the Alpha Anywhere IDE. It does not affect confirmation prompts in your app.
